mapper.select: select chat_room_seq.nextval from dual
select * from chat_room order by chat_room_no asc

SELECT m.chat_room_no, m.MEETING_NAME, m.MEETING_LOCATION, m.MEETING_DATE, m.meeting_no, c.CLUB_NO FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN CLUB c ON c.CLUB_NO = m.CLUB_NO JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.chat_room_no, m.MEETING_NAME, m.MEETING_LOCATION, m.MEETING_DATE, m.meeting_no, c.CLUB_NO, ( SELECT mi.attach_no FROM MEETING_IMAGE mi WHERE mi.meeting_no = m.meeting_no FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS meeting_attach_no, ( SELECT c2.CHAT_CONTENT FROM CHAT c2 WHERE c2.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no ORDER BY c2.CHAT_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS chat_content, ( SELECT c2.CHAT_BLIND FROM CHAT c2 WHERE c2.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no ORDER BY c2.CHAT_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS chat_blind FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN CLUB c ON c.CLUB_NO = m.CLUB_NO JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.chat_room_no, m.MEETING_NAME, m.MEETING_LOCATION, m.MEETING_DATE, m.MEETING_NO FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT cr.chat_room_no FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no INNER JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT cr.chat_room_no FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no INNER JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT cr.chat_room_no, c.club_no, c.club_name, c.club_explain, ci.attach_no, ( SELECT CHAT_CONTENT FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.chat_room_no ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS chat_content, ( SELECT CHAT_BLIND FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.chat_room_no ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS chat_blind FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no LEFT JOIN club_image ci ON c.club_no = ci.club_no WHERE cr.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT cm.club_member_id FROM club c JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE c.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID, m.member_name FROM club c JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no JOIN member m ON cm.club_member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}

SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID, m2.MEMBER_NAME FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no JOIN "MEMBER" m2 ON cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = m2.MEMBER_ID WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_level FROM member m
SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_level FROM member m
SELECT chat_room_no FROM chat WHERE (chat_sender = #{chatSender} AND chat_receiver = #{chatReceiver}) OR (chat_sender = #{chatReceiver} AND chat_receiver = #{chatSender})

SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, cm.CLUB_MEMBER_RANK, c.CHAT_ROOM_NO, c.CLUB_NO FROM club_member cm JOIN club c ON cm.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO JOIN chat_room cr ON c.CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO JOIN member m ON cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}

SELECT co.CHAT_SENDER, sender.MEMBER_NAME AS SENDER_NAME, sender.MEMBER_LEVEL AS SENDER_LEVEL, co.CHAT_RECEIVER, receiver.MEMBER_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, receiver.MEMBER_LEVEL AS RECEIVER_LEVEL, co.CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM chat_one co LEFT JOIN member sender ON co.CHAT_SENDER = sender.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN member receiver ON co.CHAT_RECEIVER = receiver.MEMBER_ID WHERE co.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}

SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID, m2.MEMBER_NAME, cm.CLUB_MEMBER_RANK, cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO, m.MEETING_NO, m.MEETING_NAME FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no JOIN "MEMBER" m2 ON cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = m2.MEMBER_ID WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT * FROM chat WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} AND chat_time > sysdate ORDER BY chat_time

SELECT cr.chat_room_no FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no INNER JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId} UNION SELECT chat_room_no FROM CHAT_ONE co WHERE chat_sender = #{memberId} OR chat_receiver = #{memberId}
SELECT * from CLUB c WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
